an5.10:4.1: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:4.3: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant who is faithless …
an5.10:4.7: witless can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:4.8: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with these five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:5.1: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:5.3: A respectful and reverent mendicant who is faithful …
an5.10:5.4: conscientious … prudent … energetic … wise can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:5.5: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
